[[Category:Atlas]][[Category:Dungeons]]
[[File:TheGrottoDungeonEntranceImage.png|625px|right|]]
__TOC__
==Notes==
* Located in the middle of the ocean, west of [[Ocllo]], north of [[Serpent's Hold]], south of [[Buccaneer's Den]], southwest of [[Magincia]], and east of [[Trinsic]].
* You'll have to be quick on your feet in here as it is a no mount area.

=Level 1 - The Grotto=
[[File:grotto_1.png|right|]]
The Entrance of the Grotto opens up to a large undersea lake which has been used by pirates as a place to stash their booty. The Grotto has been used so often that the many pirates over the years have left a small town which contains:
* A Shanty Town with Cannon Reinforcements
* Tanner and Winery
* Gallows

===Legend===
*1. Purple Moongate back to dock outside
*2. Black Moongate for ghosts only
*3. To Level 2

<gallery mode="packed" class="right">
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoEntrance.PNG|Entrance gaurded by very strong ogres!
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoGallows.PNG|The Grotto's undersea Gallows, for pirates that cant follow the rules!
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoShantyTown.PNG|The Grottos Shanty Town, complete with cannon for sneaky Ships in the lake.
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoWinery.PNG|The most important structure in the Grotto, the Winery! Nothing like a bottle of wine to celebrate a successful plunder.
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoEntranceToUnderTheGrotto.PNG|Entrance to Under the Grotto carefully guarded by trapped dragons! 
File:GrottoLevelTheGrottoSunkenShip.PNG|Grottos Sunken undersea ship
</gallery>

=Level 2 - Under the Grotto=
[[File:grotto_2.png|right|]]
Under the Grotto is where all the booty is stored. The Pirates have the essentials down for this room with 3 main areas:
* Cave Entrance
* Booty Room
* Escape Ladder

===Legend===
*1. To Level 1

<gallery mode="packed" class="right">
File:GrottoLevelUnderTheGrottoEntrance.PNG|The Entrance from the Grotto to Under the Grotto.
File:GrottoLevelUnderTheGrottoBootyRoom.PNG|The Booty room under the Grotto, it is rumored that "Ancient Shadow Wyrms" are made in that very bed.
File:GrottoLevelUnderTheGrottoHiddenLadder.PNG|The escape ladder from Under the Grotto to the Shanty Town.
</gallery>
